doc.name: PasswordAttribute
doc.description:
An attribute that represents a password. The value of this attribute is a string that represents the password in an encrypted form. To access the password in unencrypted form, call the getPassword() method. To set the password in unencrypted form, call the setPassword() method.
FIXME: we need to support the persistence and encryption.
doc.author: Edward Lee, Yang Zhao
